featured.text: Kevin burst into tears _____ because his teacher punished him in front of the whole class.
The old Eiffel Tower must be torn down.
Yusra Mardini is a swimmer who grew up in Popole Misenga was born in the Democratic the war-torn country of Syria.
Near the “black ditch” of Penghu, battered by winds of up to 70 knots, the rear sail was torn into shreds.

definition.en_def: A drop of clear salty liquid produced by glands in the eyes, often as a result of emotion or irritation; to rip or damage something.
definition.example: She shed a tear when she heard the sad news.
